Description: Blue glazed composition vase with circular base, convex sides, short neck and everted ledge-rim, front inscribed with cartouches containing prenomen, nomen and epithets of Amenhotep II.
Curator's comments: Published: W. Seipel, Ägypten Vol. 1, Linz 1989, p.252 [421]. C. Ziegler, The Pharaohs, Venice 2002, p. 481 [246].
Exhibition history: 2002 8 Sept-2003 25 May, Venice, Palazzo Grassi, Les Pharaons 2021-2022 16 Sept-9 Jan, Budapest, Museum of Fine Arts, The discovery of the Pharaoh's tomb, Amenhotep II and his time
